header.name: Jean-François Grand
header.description: Solutions Engineer with a strong team mindset and a focus on making user sentiment drive product development
header.quote: I'm gonna eat your brains and gain your knowledge

achievements: Part of the Solutions Engineering team for Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA).
Working on the Small and Medium Businesses (SMB) segment.
Helping customers find value with their users search experience.
Building Proof Of Concepts and Demos.
Assisting Account Executives to achieve Technical Win.
Built responsive single page web applications
Migrated the two main applications from AngularJS to Angular
Developed reusable components and libraries with Angular
Lead frontend development of a project with three frontend developers
Wrote REST API specifications to define contract for new features
Automatized build and deployment with GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes
Created handlebars email templates and helpers
Gave two public talks and a training on Browser Extensions
Attended professional trainings: Angular (Sfeir School), Node.js (Human Coders)
Created a website for League of Legends players using Riot Games API
Developed responsive frontend with Backbone.js and Bootstrap
Integrated Google Analytics to get insight on the product’s usage
Built backend in Java EE and rewrote it in Node.js
In charge of Branding, business model, and partners development
Member of the Speech Research Team
Migrated a foreign language learning software from C to Java
Developed a scripting interface with ScriptEngine, Jython and Luajava
Integrated the team’s speech analysis and synthesis algorithms
Contributed to European Open source project QualiPSo
Developed the issuetracker of a new generation forge with Java EE and GWT
Developed components for a GWT library: OpenParts
